title: A Breath of air
brief_description: The film’s main purpose is to help to discourage cigarette smoking by teenagers. It presents to secondary school students a summary of biological and other scientific evidence on the health hazards of smoking. The film contains animated sequences, microphotography, still photos and charts which effectively present its case against smoking cigarettes.
